website_summaries.verdict: A unique, elegant glass shaker with recipes printed right on it for convenience.
pros: Glass salad dressing mixer with ml and fluid ounce measurements directly on glass
Nearly anti-tip spout with sealing plastic lid to prevent messes
Recipes and measuring lines printed directly onto bottle
Clear cap rests on silicone funnel to prevent spills
cons: Better for thinner dressings than thick, creamy dressings

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof and no drip pour!
customer_reviews.text: We never buy store-bought salad dressings and they have been making our own for years. Finally we found the best container for our dressings. I love the fact that these are class and not plastic which leeches into your dressing especially the acidic vinaigrettes. You can mix it right in the bottle and none of it leaks out. We have three right now and I think we might order more. It keeps everything in the refrigerator neat and organized looking. My husband made a Greek dressing with feta cheese on it and it actually came out because the hole is big enough for the cheese chunks to fit through yet it pours daintily if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: Where has this shaker bottle been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell you how much I love this shaker bottle. It's a game changer when it comes to making dressing. I used to use a mason jar and the lid would get so nasty and start to rust from the vinegar. So much easier to keep this shaker clean, to pour, and to measure. One of my best kitchen purchases in the last few years.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Windstar

customer_reviews.title: okay, small jar opening
customer_reviews.text: I had a salad dressing shaker I really liked but it was plastic and I never could get it clean. The glass bottle of the leifheit takes care of that problem. I like the spout, it's very easy to to get the dressing out and the lid is nice for storage. However, the opening is small, so I can't really juice a lemon or grate garlic straight into the jar. I have to use another bowl and then transfer to the bottle, so that is annoying and extra work and the reason I'm giving this a three star, and continuing on my search for salad dressing bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Becky at the beach

customer_reviews.title: OK if you don't mind it dirty
customer_reviews.text: The rubber piece came off and it's impossible to get the glass clean. I really wanted glass, not plastic. No matter how many cycles I put it through the dishwasher, the oil never seems to come off the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: a big improvement over the Oxo for me
customer_reviews.text: There are two tops: a screw off containing the spout, and a pop off clear top which closes the spout when shaking the bottle. The good thing here is that the spout screw off does screw off relatively easy. Some may think the bottle mouth a bit small. The clear pop off needs to be held in place while shaking. I found the screw off and pop off pieces difficult to place in the dish washer. But, otherwise, I'm happy enough with this shaker.
customer_reviews.author: Lohengrin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality; easy clean
customer_reviews.text: Great non-drip nozzle and seems to be good quality. Easy to clean. Like that it is glass not plastic. We have several for different dressings. Our only issue with it is that the tapered shape makes it easy to slip out of ones hand and crash to the floor, especially when damp just out of the refrigerator. It has happened to us, and resulted in 4 not 5 star rating. While disappointed in the tapered shape, we replaced the broken one with another just like it because it otherwise is so good.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Really leak-free! But you have to eye-ball fluid ounces
customer_reviews.text: My main concern before getting this was whether it would really be leak-free when you shake it, and I am happy to report it is 100% leak-free! It doesn't leak into the lid, and it also doesn't leak from the screw-on cap. My only criticism is that fluid ounces are shown as their ml equivalents - that is, 4.4 oz (130 ml), 2.4 oz (70 ml), etc. I wish the jar markings would show the ounces in full ounces (1 oz, 2 oz, 3 oz, etc.) so I could use the jar to measure from U.S. recipes. I can eyeball the measurements but this could be a design upgrade to accommodate those of us who still measure in ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Jrsygrl

customer_reviews.title: Love that it is glass!
customer_reviews.text: Great little dressing mixer. I love that it is glass with a large enough mouth for adding ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Auslander

customer_reviews.title: Best salad dressing bottle ever
customer_reviews.text: Seals nicely and and has nice measurement markers on them. Made in China but its German engineering and its a beautiful thing. Machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Don't drop it!
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this product. It was just as advertised and I enjoyed using it for about a month. Then as sometimes happens, especially with something that contains greasy material like salad dressing, it slipped out of my hands. When it hit the floor, it broke, not exaggerating, into hundreds of tiny pieces. I have been finding them for the last two weeks. Not sure what it is about this material or maybe the laws of physics are unusual in my kitchen, but just wanted to warn people to be careful
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Easy to make a dressing right in the bottle because it has measurements on the side. It seals well so you can emulsify a vinaigrette just by shaking it and it doesn’t leak. They have apparently redesigned the top since so many people complained of it breaking, and so far mine is just fine. This was definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Either I'm getting old or it's just too small...
customer_reviews.text: I like the bottle's functionality and the lid/pouring spout is perfect for no mess dispensing. But if you are planning on using the recipes and measurement guide printed on the bottle, be aware that it is nearly impossible to read. I don't wear glasses but need only readers on occasion but even then it is just too hard to measure using the bottle's instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Gentleman

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a leak proof salad dressing shaker bottle
customer_reviews.text: I hate shaking homemade salad dressing and ending up with a slippery, oily bottle due to leakage. When you put the lid on this bottle, the silicone pour spout presses against the inside of the lid, causing a tight seal. So you put the lid on and shake, and there's no leakage and no slippery bottle. I've washed it a few times and it still is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Edison buyer

customer_reviews.title: good shaker/ ridiculous recipes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shaker, can't read the recipes on the bottle. When I grabbed my reader glasses, which I only need to read hair product bottle instructions, the ingredients needed for the recipes were a bit involved for my purpose. Easy to find simple salad dressing recipes so not a big deal for me. If you are buying for the recipes on the bottle, look carefully before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Withers

customer_reviews.title: It works as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Having put this shaker bottle to use a few times now it has met my expectations. The quality is good. It has clear measuring lines that makes it easy to add ingredients. It pours nicely and the cap stays on well. All-in-all, exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Greg P

customer_reviews.title: Great dressing bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is the best I've found after using a few of these over the years. It's made of "safe" materials (minimal plastic), seals well, zero mess, quality make, etc.). Well worth the cost to me (and I paid a bit more than the current price of $17).
customer_reviews.author: Wingnutsglory

customer_reviews.title: Practical and good-looking
customer_reviews.text: What can I say - it's German quality! :) Ok, so I'm biased because I am German but this is very nice. Solid, well designed and nice enough to put on the table. Giving this as a housewarming gift.
customer_reviews.author: Germangirl

customer_reviews.title: Love this shaker--one of the few glass shakers on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this shaker--one of the few glass shakers on the market. Others I have tried have been disappointing. This one is a great shape with a spout that pours just the right amount of dressing--and it doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: CC1727

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is great. It allows you to shake the dressing without it spilling. It pours out in a slow stream so you don't overdo it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Aversano

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these for gifts for my two daughters and daughter-in-law. They really liked them so I guess I should get one for myself. They especially liked that they were glass and not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: no-drip salad dressing
customer_reviews.text: seals nicely at the top, clear glass bottle, good dispenser, the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: JLW

customer_reviews.title: No dribble
customer_reviews.text: Excellent engineering, spill proof top, now I get all the good stuff that's on the bottom . No dribble
customer_reviews.author: Don Philippbar

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Can’t read the recipes on the side. Too small and in 2 languages.
customer_reviews.author: mck

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and as hoped it would. Is leak proof as long as you make sure the cap is down tight before shaking. Easy to clean - bottle in the dishwasher and top parts in the sink. Some water spots on the bottle when other dishes in the dishwasher have none. Am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mrfen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This bottle works great. The rubber nozzle top and plastic cap seal well so it doesn't make a mess when shaking or pouring. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DCMC84

customer_reviews.title: Good Reusable Glass Bottle to Store Dressing In
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but I don't use it to prepare Salad Dressing. that I do in a bowl with a wisk. I use it to store Home Made dressing in the refrigerator. I like the glass bottle instead of plastic. It should be larger, 16 ounces would be ideal. I don't use the recipes printed on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Navy Seal

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to make dressings - easy to lose the lid too
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Four

customer_reviews.title: only wish
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would of put only English on the writing on the bottle .
customer_reviews.author: Jacob melucci

customer_reviews.title: A great, no-leak salad dressing container
customer_reviews.text: We like ours so much we bought this for a gift! Doesn’t leak at all. Easy to clean in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Julie I

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Very functional! I’ve had it for over a year now. I like to make homemade dressing with evoo , lemon juice or vinegar. No leaks. Pours cleanly with no dribbling. There are 3 main parts; the bottom clear receptacle, the black screw off cap, and the clear pop off cap. The clear bottom and clear cap I put in the dishwasher, but I do gently hand wash the middle screw off top only because it has a small rubbery gasket thingy that i worry might pop off. But it looks nice, doesn’t leak at all, shakes well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Great Dressing Shaker
customer_reviews.text: I like this salad dressing bottle because it has all the measurements etched on the side for easy use. The bottom piece is glass. I have made many dressings in this. It works fine. I have put ONLY the glass part in the dishwasher with no problems. It gets four stars because its a shaker. If you look at the bottle, its not ergonomic. So you have to be careful shaking it, or itll fly out of your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Trezza

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these shakers for salad dressing. Like the thick glass for storage in the fridge. My recipe makes about 1 and a third cups so this just does hold it. I don't use any recipes or measurements that come on the bottle. The glass bottle goes in the dishwasher. The plastic top comes apart. I wash the top parts by hand. The ring and spout I assume are silicone while the rest of the top is a hard plastic. It is drip free when you get the hang of it. Happy to find these!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Spout gets a bit messy but I love that it's glass, love that it has the measurements and that make, serve and store from this!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY a glass salad dressing bottle! I'd love an even larger one when I make more for larger crowds...I dump my ingredients in this bottle, shake it up, serve and store in it. The spout gets a bit messier than I like but we just wipe it down before storing.
customer_reviews.author: Gratitude

customer_reviews.title: Glass. Perfect. Fresh dressing daily!
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to buy as my previous Pampered Chef was larger. BUT I really wanted glass and not plastic which the PC was plastic and finally cracked and chipped. This is smaller however I love the glass and I use the recipes on the side as a guideline only. I’ve been making dressing from scratch/ “eyeballing” ingredients for 40 years. This makes enough simple dressing for 4-5 side salads. Love the top pour - not too fast. Easy to clean. I leave this out on the counter without worry of spoiling. Hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Corman

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: It has the potential to be a great salad dressing bottle, but my ranch dressing is a little to thick for an easy pour, we have to shake it out really hard or unscrew the top. I really wanted it to work because I've been wanting a glass bottle for my homemade dressing.
customer_reviews.author: SRob

customer_reviews.title: Just What I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried at least 3-4 different salad dressing containers and this i the only one that doesn't leak. It is sturdy, easy to use and the different measurement marks on the glass are helpful. It is not the easiest thing to clean, especially the washer in the lid but it is worth it. And it is GLASS - so no worries about plastic residue in the dressing. It works well and I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mikinp

customer_reviews.title: Problem with cap
customer_reviews.text: I loved this salad dressing container. The glass is thick and the spout is really drip-free, which was nearly impossible to find (I've tried quite a few types of salad dressing bottles). Unfortunately, as I took it out of the refrigerator it slipped right out of the cap and fell in the floor, breaking a big hole on the side as a chunk of glass came out. I wasn't being careless or picking it up only from the cap - it actually really surprised me as it kind of slipped right out and fell. I'm so disappointed, I bought 2 of them for 2 different dressings and they were not inexpensive items.
customer_reviews.author: atx14

customer_reviews.title: Leaks all the time
customer_reviews.text: Great size and like the glass bottle. However, it constantly leaks no matter what is done. It seems to even leak when it is just sitting upright. Do NOT waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: JMo

customer_reviews.title: Nice but lid leaks a little
customer_reviews.text: This would be five stars except that the lid leaks so there’s always just a little ring of oil residue that gets of the table whenever we use it. But it’s a very good, strong implement otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Great shaker bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love this bottle and the recipes written on the bottle. Encourages me to keep making my own dressings
customer_reviews.author: Cmonroe

customer_reviews.title: Nice little dressing bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size, easy to hold while shaking, & the wider bottom helps keep it from tipping over if bumped in a crowded refrigerator. Recipes In German & English on the glass are hard to read. I have my own recipes so I don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Phonniball

customer_reviews.title: Well and thoughtfully designed!
customer_reviews.text: My cousin has had 2 of these for years. Hers still look good as new. I recently bought one and it is a 10! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: great little bottle for salad dressing
customer_reviews.text: great little bottle for salad dressing. you can fill it at the wide mouth, close it up shake it and remove the lid to pour a gentle stream on you salad.
customer_reviews.author: new insights for me

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottle
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bottle! Love the recipes on the side and I can’t wait to use it! Nicer than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: amber27

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product! At last a nice container that doesn't leak!
customer_reviews.text: Very delighted with this superior product. Really excellent design and quality.
customer_reviews.author: lovetogift

customer_reviews.title: so the water was comfortable to the touch
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this item. the glass is not properly tempered. I've had this less than a month. Today when I took it out of the refrigerator, the salad dressing was congealed, so I placed the cruet in a bowl of warm, not hot water. The bottom blew out of it, dumping almost a whole batch of salad dressing. we keep our hot water heater set to less than 140°, so the water was comfortable to the touch. No excuse for this. Thankfully Amazon is granting us a refund. I'll order a different cruet.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie Davis

product_meta.title: Leifheit Salad Dressing Shaker Bottle, Black
product_meta.description: Leifheit Salad Dressing Shaker is an elegant glass container specifically designed for making, storing, and serving salad dressings and sauces! The lidded glass bottle has ml and fluid oz. measurements marked directly on it, so it is a measuring cup too! It also has classic salad dressing recopies on the glass! It even has an anti-drip pour spout! This glass salad dressing bottle means healthier, homemade salad dressing with less mess and less fuss. The high quality glass is dishwasher safe with a fill volume of 300 ml. The label and measurement markings are also dishwasher safe. After all, excellent sauces and refined dressings betray a cook's true ability. With the Dressing Shaker from Leifheit, mixing an exquisite salad dressing or sauce is child's play. Only cleaner, tidier, and with consistent results!
feature_bullets: Glass salad dressing mixer with ml and fluid oz measurements directly on glass
Practical anti-drip spout with sealing plastic lid to prevent messes
Recipe scales for measuring directly in the bottle
